tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_sensors_locations (
  sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  deployment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE QuantumSensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorReadings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    reading_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES QuantumSensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    region TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_latitude DECIMAL,
    location_longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Deployments (
    deployment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID,
    deployment_date TIMESTAMP,
    deployment_location VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Agents (
    agent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50),
    agent_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SensorReadings (
    reading_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID,
    reading_value DECIMAL,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE quantum_sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    deployment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    reading_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    humidity DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_calibration (
    calibration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    calibration_date DATE,
    calibration_factor DECIMAL(8,6)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    error_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(20),
    install_date DATE
)
